briefdescription.para: Get the right Jacobian.

simplesect.para: this is the right Jacobian of exp, what is commonly known as "the right Jacobian".
See Eq. (41) for the right Jacobian of general functions.
See Eqs. (126,143,163,179,191) for implementations of the right Jacobian of exp.

briefdescription.para: Get the left Jacobian.

simplesect.para: this is the left Jacobian of exp, what is commonly known as "the left Jacobian".
See Eq. (44) for the left Jacobian of general functions.
See Eqs. (126,145,164,179,191) for implementations of the left Jacobian of exp.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate whether this and v are 'close'.

detaileddescription.para:
This evaluation is performed element-wise.
v
A vector.
eps
Threshold for equality copmarison.
true if the Tangent element t is 'close' to this, false otherwise.
